item.title: Reading Group 4: RoboCasa: Large-Scale Simulation of Everyday Tasks for Generalist Robots
item.description: large scale and realistic simulation framework for scaling up robotics data collection

item.title: About
item.description: We are Waterloos first Humanoid robotics collective. While we’re still in the early stages, we’re organizing weekly reading groups to explore the foundations of robotics, specifically humanoid robotics, with the goal of applying what we learn to hands-on projects.

item.title: Reading Group 3: SayCan: Do As I Can, Not As I Say
Reading Group 2: Diffusion Policy: Visuomotor Policy Learning via Action Diffusion
Reading group 1: Universal Manipulation Inteface (UMI)
item.description: Our very first session! We talked about what the Humanoid collective could be and learnt about the foundations of how robots learn using UMI paper
